channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
#1 How do i add Dragonfire Shield effect i already learned how to add the bonusses, thanks to moparscape!
#2 How do i add a godwars minigame that haves a lobby with timer and a tickey system..
#3 How do i block SYIPKPKER i already tried to look on tutorials but if i compile i get still errors. And still not working tested my syipkpker on it. ( I DOWNLOADED ONE BECAUSE I WANTED TO TEST ON MY SERVER IF I MADE BLOCKERS )
#4 | The one of the biggest problem! If i wear 3rd age platelegs / platebody / helm it works. But if i wear kite, amulet, 3rd age range or mage it wont work and wield all those items as weapon ?!
Using: Figment Source Thanks for all people that takes a look to my topic or helps me!

item.description:
@synob wrote:

Fixed some few 3rd Age.

Now i added DFS correct it says :

client.java:24130: gfx100 in client cannot be applied to <int,int>
attackingon2.gfx100<579,0>;
^

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

dfs: if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 15185 && misc.random(6)==1){ hitDiff = misc.random(25); AttackingOn2.gfx100(579,0); }

gw:
theres a tut on r-s i think

block syi:
add a log-in limit so only 3 ppl from an ip can log-in, its best way of stopping that i no of, thers a tutorial by meiscooldude in the tut section

item wielding:
add the items in the correct sections in item4.java or item.java depending where it reads it from (do in both if not sure)

YOUR WELCOME
